document_data.name: Bash
document_data.mainbody: sh was a huge man with gray skin, and short black hair with muttonchops.
document_data.Description: Bash was a huge man with gray skin, and short black hair with muttonchops.
document_data.Personality: He didn't care much for his party's inaction, and just wanted them to get somewhere exciting.
document_data.History:
[[File:Ball and Chain adventurers.jpg|300px|thumb|''Bash and his crew at the tavern.'']]
In between adventures, he visited the [[Ball and Chain Tavern]] on the docks of the [[Wheloon Prison]] alongside his fellows [[Irwynne]], [[Gorli]], and [[Marbone]].
